import React,{Fragment} from 'react' import { useSelector,useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import {cartAction} from '../Store/CartReducer' const Cart = () => { const cart = useSelector(state => state.cart.items) const dispatch = useDispatch() const removeCart =(id)=>{ dispatch(cartAction.removeItem(id)) } const addQtyCart =(car)=>{ dispatch(cartAction.addTocart({ id:car.id, name:car.name, quantity:car.quantity })) } return ( {!cart ?
